SOBRE MI

Soy {{data.name}}

Tengo {{age}} años y soy de {{data.nationality}}

{{item}}

¿Tienes un proyecto interesante? Hablemos!

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from 'src/app/services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent implements OnInit { data:any; age:any; private birth:any; constructor(private dataService:DataService){} //this.birth = Date.parse(this.data.date_of_birth); //this.age = Math.floor(((Date.now() - this.birth) / (1000 * 3600 * 24))/365); ngOnInit(): void { this.dataService.getData().subscribe({ next: (resp) => { this.data = resp[0]; console.log("Main -> Datos Personales: "+JSON.stringify(this.data)); }, error: (error) => { console.error(error); } }); this.dataService.getData().subscribe(dataService => { this.data = dataService[0]; }); } }
